1405040.name: GoVenture Entrepreneur
1405040.description:
Do you want to be the next business tycoon, corporate CEO, or social entrepreneur?

Well, it all starts right here!

GoVenture Entrepreneur is the most realistic small business startup and operations simulation in the world. Start with a lemonade stand, level up to a kiosk, food truck, and then operate a full business, minute by minute, hour by hour, and day by day.

Experience everything you need to know about the basics of starting and running a business.

Ideal for players of all ages and levels.

This is your first step to being your own boss!

Business Types You Can Play

​

Lemonade Stand
  • Lemonade

Kiosk Business
  • Ice Cream
  • Tacos
  • Hot Dogs
  • Popcorn & Snacks
  • Clothing
  • Costume Jewelry
  • Electronics
​
Full Business
  • Casual Restaurant
  • Pizza Restaurant
  • Cafe
  • Ice Cream Store
  • Fitness Gym
  • Auto Parts
  • Veterinary Clinic
  • Cosmetics
  • Department Store

​
Well-known brands that match the business types above include the following (note that these brands do NOT appear in the simulation) — McDonald’s, Burger King, Wendy’s, Pizza Hut, Domino’s, Starbucks, Duncan, Tim Hortons, Baskin Robbins, Dairy Queen, Planet Fitness, LA Fitness, Midas, Meineke, Pet Depot, L'Oréal, Clinique, Walmart, Target. These brands are registered trademarks of their respective owners and are not affiliated with GoVenture.
1405040.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
